metadata.name: Antibirth Item Pack
metadata.description:
All of these items were present in the acclaimed Antibirth mod, so we decided to bring them back!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tp9LIOS.png[/img] [list] [*]Features EID support in: English [img]https://i.imgur.com/11ORCm6.png[/img] Español [img]https://i.imgur.com/BCCFhHE.png[/img] Pусский [img]https://i.imgur.com/vFcOh4w.png[/img] [*]Features Abyss and Book of Virtues synergies [*]Has "Job" & "ExtraBirthright" compatibility for Book of Despair [/list] [h1]𝐁𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐨𝐟 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐚𝐢𝐫[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/MY39Vd6.png[/img] Active item that halves tear delay for one room [img]https://i.imgur.com/MY39Vd6.png[/img]
[h1]𝐁𝐨𝐰𝐥 𝐨𝐟 𝐓𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/TZB17gX.png[/img] Active item that shoots a large tear burst and is recharged by shooting [img]https://i.imgur.com/TZB17gX.png[/img]
[h1]𝐃𝐨𝐧𝐤𝐞𝐲 𝐉𝐚𝐰𝐛𝐨𝐧𝐞[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/0EsXci0.png[/img] Passive item that procs when hit, sending Isaac into a spin attack [img]https://i.imgur.com/0EsXci0.png[/img]
[h1]𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐡[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/sVi2GCI.png[/img] Familiar that causes Isaac's tears to be multiplied when hit [img]https://i.imgur.com/sVi2GCI.png[/img]
[h1]𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐁𝐨𝐦𝐛𝐬[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LDtvGeB.png[/img] Bomb item that shoots out rock waves in the 4 cardinal directions [img]https://i.imgur.com/LDtvGeB.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/0YXOqPH.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = Sillst [*][u]𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = kittenchilly, BrakeDude, anchikai. [*][u]𝐒𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐫[/u] = Michael¿? [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭[/u] = cat,, [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = Kotry, BrakeDude [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = kittenchilly, Sillst, BrakeDude, anchikai. Luigi_Gamer124, Blixy, Blind the Bound Demon [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, ALADAR, anchikai., Blind the Bound Demon, Blixy, BrakeDude, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Goncholito, jubbalub, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Luigi124, Merlin, Michael¿?, PixelPlz, poody_blue, Royal, Sillst, skippy, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/code]]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]Community Remix mod[/u] - Creating the original concepts for Book of Despair and Donkey Jawbone [u]_Kilburn[/u] - Creating the original concepts for Bowl of Tears, Menorah, and Stone Bombs, as well as the revised version of Donkey Jawbone [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GKVOZZ8.png[/img]
